item.title: Discovering the latest trends on Orchard Road
item.description: This year, I participated in a Jane’s Walk called “Trend Safari: Innovations in Your Backyard in Singapore,” led by Nathania Christy, TrendWatching’s Insight & Community Lead for the Asia-Pacific region. The walk provided a condensed version of TrendWatching’s client activity focused on identifying trends and sparking business innovation. Our group explored parts of Orchard Road, a major shopping district, to uncover emerging societal, retail, and commercial trends. Our starting point was a recent pop-up booth outside Crate & Barrel.
